answers.question: Which of the following describes Python's case sensitivity?

answers.question: What is Interactive Mode in Python?
options: A mode that only works for graphical user interfaces
A command-line interface for executing single statements and getting immediate results
A mode used for debugging existing code
A mode for writing long programs and saving them as files
answers.user_answer: A command-line interface for executing single statements and getting immediate results
answers.correct_answer: A command-line interface for executing single statements and getting immediate results

answers.question: What is Script Mode in Python?
options: A mode for entering commands one-by-one
A mode for interactive data analysis
A mode for writing a complete program in a file and executing it later
A mode used only for simple calculations
answers.user_answer: A mode for writing a complete program in a file and executing it later
answers.correct_answer: A mode for writing a complete program in a file and executing it later

answers.question: How do you enter Interactive Mode from the command line?

answers.user_answer: By typing python and pressing Enter
answers.correct_answer: By typing python and pressing Enter

options: It is faster than Interactive Mode
It provides instant feedback for every command
The code is saved in a file and can be reused or modified
It does not require a text editor
answers.user_answer: The code is saved in a file and can be reused or modified
answers.correct_answer: The code is saved in a file and can be reused or modified

answers.question: Which character set is the most common standard for Python 3?

The alphabet used in a programming language

answers.user_answer: A group of letters that can be used in a program
answers.correct_answer: A set of characters and their corresponding numerical values

answers.question: What is Interactive Mode in Python?
options: A mode that only works for graphical user interfaces
A command-line interface for executing single statements and getting immediate results
A mode used for debugging existing code
A mode for writing long programs and saving them as files

answers.correct_answer: A command-line interface for executing single statements and getting immediate results

A mode for interactive data analysis
A mode for writing a complete program in a file and executing it later
A mode used only for simple calculations
answers.user_answer: A mode for entering commands one-by-one
